definition: (of a flower) to attract bees and butterflies/(fig.) to attract the opposite sex/to flirt
Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子 dreams of a butterfly (or is it the butterfly dreaming of Zhuangzi?)
Dieshan district of Wuzhou city 梧州市[Wu2 zhou1 shi4], Guangxi
lit. to break through a cocoon and turn into a butterfly (idiom)/fig. to emerge strong after a period of struggle/to get to a better place after going through difficult period

sentences.english: Butterfly forward movement is caused by arm pull and hip movement upwards.
sentences.chinese: 蝶向前是靠拉臂上提臀促成。

sentences.english: A group of young people butterfly valley, play a cave-in events, one man die.
sentences.chinese: 一羣年輕人們蝶幽谷玩，一次塌方事件，一個人死了。

sentences.english: A magnified shot shows the head of a tiger swallowtail butterfly larva.
sentences.chinese: 在老虎鳳尾蝶幼蟲的頭部有一個大斑點。

sentences.english: Chan feels that the experience of studying these butterflies has improved his life.
sentences.chinese: 詹家龍覺得研究紫斑蝶讓他的人生更完美。

sentences.english: To get them to fix that, the one arm drill does a nice job.
sentences.chinese: 要糾正這個錯誤，做單臂蝶練習很有效。

sentences.english: So should New England's loss of the regal fritillary.
sentences.chinese: 新英格蘭帝王豹紋蝶的消失也應如此。

sentences.english: That is when your butterfly comes out of the chrysalis.
Maolin's Purple Butterfly Valley is where Taiwan's purple crow butterflies spend the winter.
sentences.chinese: 茂林的紫蝶幽谷是臺灣紫斑蝶過冬的地方。

sentences.english: The butterfly is on the verge of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 枯葉蝶真是因此而要絕對的絕滅了。

sentences.english: Time chasing the wind driven residues, defying thorn spend about butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 風趕殘云云追月，蝶不畏刺花有約。

sentences.english: It’s how you perform during the ”silent years” that determine if you leave the chrysalis and become the butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 你在潛伏期的表現決定了你是否能化蛹爲蝶。

sentences.english: I know you mean the leaf butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 我知道了，你說的是枯葉蝶吧。

sentences.english: Words like carrying the wing of the butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 詩行攜帶着未來猶如飛翼的蝶。

sentences.english: Monarch caterpillar has now been spotted in places such as Bermuda.
sentences.chinese: 君主蝶的毛蟲現在開始出現在百慕大地區一類的地方。

sentences.english: The study group was furthermore divided into 2 groups according to the execution of SPAL.
sentences.chinese: 試驗組根據是否行蝶齶動脈結紮術再分成兩組。

sentences.english: Chilades pandava is a new kind of insect harmful to sago cycas.
sentences.chinese: 曲紋紫灰蝶是蘇鐵上一種新害蟲。

definition: Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
